                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%B4%82%E5%B1%B1%E5%86%8D%E6%AC%A1%E5%9B%9E%E5%BA%94%E5%A4%96%E5%9B%BD%E4%BA%BA%E6%8F%92%E9%98%9F%23&amp;from=default">#崂山再次回应外国人插队#</a>：将依法处置】4月1日，有网友称青岛某社区市民排队核酸检测时出现外国人插队情况。青岛市崂山区人民政府新闻办公室官方微博发布通报称，目前，相关部门正在进一步调查核实。下一步，根据调查核实情况，坚持中国人、外国人一视同仁，依法依规进行处置，调查结果将及时向社会 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IBpXLEnJ5" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4489179419624327:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4489179419624327&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

        </div>
    </div>
</div>

                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%8A%E6%B5%B7%E6%96%B0%E5%A2%9E%E5%A2%83%E5%A4%96%E8%BE%93%E5%85%A5%E7%97%85%E4%BE%8B6%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#上海新增境外输入病例6例#</a>，为俄罗斯、美国、英国输入病例】4月1日0—24时，通过口岸联防联控机制，报告6例境外输入性新冠肺炎确诊病例，分别自俄罗斯（2例）、美国（1例）、英国（3例）输入。新增治愈出院2例，其中来自西班牙1例，来自法国1例。4月1日0—24时，无新增本地新冠肺炎确诊病例。 ​​​​                                            </div>

            <div class="face"><a target="_blank" class="W_face_radius" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_pic" href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" title="人民日报"><img usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" src="https://tvax3.sinaimg.cn/crop.28.0.969.969.1024/a716fd45ly8gdijd1zmonj20sa0saaby.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&amp;Expires=1609515648&amp;ssig=%2F5XD%2FKAUwa" width="50" height="50" alt="人民日报" class="W_face_radius"></a></div>
                    </div>

        <div class="WB_detail">
                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民日报</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4489169512952112" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IBpHNcnYI?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-02 07:47" date="1585784879000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4489169512952112:fromprofile"> 2020-4-2 07:47</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%AD%A6%E6%B1%89%E6%97%A0%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%E5%B0%8F%E5%8C%BA%E8%BE%BE99%25%23&amp;from=default">#武汉无疫情小区达99%#</a>，继续加油！】4月1日，武汉市公布全市第十次评定的无疫情小区、社区、村（大队）名单，命名第六批无疫情街道（乡镇）。截至4月1日16时，全市无疫情小区累计7033个，占比99.0%；无疫情社区累计1359个，占比96.7%；无疫情村（大队）累计1941个，占比99.9%。（长江日报） ​​​​                                            </div>

                                <a name="4489165171112058" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IBpAN4Fiq?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-02 07:30" date="1585783844000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4489165171112058:fromprofile"> 2020-4-2 07:30</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	                                            <span title="可于本微博右侧下拉菜单查看编辑记录">已编辑</span>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%84%8F%E5%A4%A7%E5%88%A93000%E4%B8%87%E6%B5%B7%E5%A4%96%E5%8F%A3%E7%BD%A92200%E4%B8%87%E6%9D%A5%E8%87%AA%E4%B8%AD%E5%9B%BD%23&amp;from=default">#意大利3000万海外口罩2200万来自中国#</a>】当地时间4月1日下午，意大利外交与国际合作部长迪马约在众议院接受问询时表示，自疫情暴发以来，意大利总计从海外获得约3000万只口罩，其中2200万只来自于中国。<br>迪马约称，新冠肺炎疫情暴发后，意大利医疗物资和个人防护用品全面告急，他与包括中国在内的多 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IBpAN4Fiq" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4489165171112058:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4489165171112058&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                <li class="">

                                <a name="4489158876001214" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IBpqDpbbM?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-02 07:05" date="1585782343000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4489158876001214:fromprofile"> 2020-4-2 07:05</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/19DcdW" rel="nofollow">微博视频</a>            	                                            <span title="可于本微博右侧下拉菜单查看编辑记录">已编辑</span>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【微视频｜<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E8%87%B3%E6%9A%97%E6%97%B6%E5%88%BB%E9%97%AA%E7%83%81%E8%BF%87%E7%9A%84%E5%85%89%23&amp;from=default">#至暗时刻闪烁过的光#</a>】过去的两个多月，可能是大多数武汉人生命中的至暗时刻。当我们都成为战士，才知道胜利的艰辛。那些黑暗里闪烁过的星光，就是你我他…一段MV，献给疫情中携手奋战的每一个人↓↓&nbsp;&nbsp;<a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4489158876001214:1034-video:1034%3A4489155259072516:page_100206_home:2803301701:4489158876001214:2803301701" title="人民日报的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A6ZpkNEQ" alt="http://t.cn/A6ZpkNEQ" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>人民日报的微博视频</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%96%E5%8D%AB%E7%BB%84%E7%BB%87%E7%A7%B0%E6%9C%AA%E6%9D%A5%E5%87%A0%E5%A4%A9%E5%85%A8%E7%90%83%E7%97%85%E4%BE%8B%E5%B0%86%E8%B6%85100%E4%B8%87%23&amp;from=default">#世卫组织称未来几天全球病例将超100万#</a>，<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%E6%98%AF%E4%BA%BA%E7%B1%BB%E7%AC%AC%E4%B8%80%E4%B8%AA%E5%86%A0%E7%8A%B6%E7%97%85%E6%AF%92%E5%A4%A7%E6%B5%81%E8%A1%8C%23&amp;from=default">#新冠肺炎是人类第一个冠状病毒大流行#</a>】世卫组织总干事谭德塞在4月1日表示，在过去5周，确诊病例接近爆发性增长，几乎所有国家和地区都报告了确诊病例。过去一周，死亡病例增长了一倍多，在未来几天内，确诊病例将超过100万，死亡病例将超过5万。世卫组织表 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IBpfV8QMz" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4489152232109523:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4489152232109523&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E8%A5%BF%E6%98%8C%E9%80%9A%E6%8A%A5%E6%A3%AE%E6%9E%97%E7%81%AB%E7%81%BE%E6%9C%80%E6%96%B0%E6%83%85%E5%86%B5%23&amp;from=default">#西昌通报森林火灾最新情况#</a>：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E8%A5%BF%E6%98%8C%E5%8D%97%E7%BA%BF%E5%B1%B1%E7%81%AB%E8%94%93%E5%BB%B6%23&amp;from=default">#西昌南线山火蔓延#</a>，西昌城区可见明火】据西昌发布通报，经4月1日3800余人全力扑救，截至中午12时，西昌市经久乡森林火灾东线、北线、西线三个区域明火已扑灭，转入烟点和余火处置。南线电池厂后山和响水沟剩两条火线，组织1025人进行了扑救，但受风力影响，晚19时10分 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IBmqts9wE" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4489043456709804:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4489043456709804&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%88%98%E7%96%AB%E4%B8%80%E7%BA%BF%E9%93%81%E4%BA%BA%E5%BC%A0%E5%AE%9A%E5%AE%87%E7%9A%84%E6%95%85%E4%BA%8B%23&amp;from=default">#战疫一线铁人张定宇的故事#</a>】在这次抗击疫情战斗中，金银潭医院始终引人关注。而这里另外备受关注的，就是身患渐冻症的“铁人院长”张定宇。日日夜夜、风风火火、铿铿锵锵，张定宇和他的战友，用最大努力和最小牺牲，为保护这座城市尽了全力！<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E9%93%81%E4%BA%BA%E5%BC%A0%E5%AE%9A%E5%AE%87%23&amp;from=default">#铁人张定宇#</a>的故事，让人动容↓↓&nbsp;&nbsp;​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IBlUWt0aV" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4489023906912189:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4489023906912189&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4489016030071894" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IBlIf0iHA?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-01 21:38" date="1585748286000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4489016030071894:fromprofile"> 2020-4-1 21:38</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%90%91%E5%85%85%E6%BB%A1%E5%B8%8C%E6%9C%9B%E7%9A%84%E6%98%A5%E5%A4%A9%E5%87%BA%E5%8F%91%23&amp;from=default">#向充满希望的春天出发#</a>！】告别三月，我们迎来人间四月天。春光中，一列列货车、客车恢复正常运营，奔驰在城市和乡村之间，穿行在春暖花开的大地上。它们满载着新生与梦想，奔向充满希望的春天。鲜花盛开，春风拂面，愿我们都能不负春光！<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%A4%8D%E5%B7%A5%E5%A4%8D%E4%BA%A7%E4%BF%9D%E5%8D%AB%E6%88%98%23&amp;from=default">#复工复产保卫战#</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

                    <a href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民日报</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4489010183539602" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IBlyOeQOm?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-01 21:14" date="1585746892000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4489010183539602:fromprofile"> 2020-4-1 21:14</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	                                            <span title="可于本微博右侧下拉菜单查看编辑记录">已编辑</span>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">

                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%BC%A0%E6%96%87%E5%AE%8F%E8%AF%B4%E6%97%A0%E7%97%87%E7%8A%B6%E6%84%9F%E6%9F%93%E8%80%85%E6%B2%A1%E9%82%A3%E4%B9%88%E5%8F%AF%E6%80%95%23&amp;from=default">#张文宏说无症状感染者没那么可怕#</a>，但不能忽略】复旦大学附属华山医院感染科主任张文宏日前表示，无症状感染现象在传染病里比较常见，对此既要重视，但是又不能过度解读。有无症状携带者，肯定会有有症状感染者。一个社会中全是无症状感染者在人群中潜伏是不现实的。现在全国大多数地区有症状的病例 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IBluwiCux" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4489007524437869:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4489007524437869&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

            <div class="face"><a target="_blank" class="W_face_radius" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_pic" href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" title="人民日报"><img usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" src="https://tvax3.sinaimg.cn/crop.28.0.969.969.1024/a716fd45ly8gdijd1zmonj20sa0saaby.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&amp;Expires=1609515656&amp;ssig=UhUFmxz8dx" width="50" height="50" alt="人民日报" class="W_face_radius"></a></div>

        <div class="WB_detail">

                    <a href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民日报</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【愿平安！<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%9B%9B%E5%B7%9D%E7%94%98%E5%AD%9C5.6%E7%BA%A7%E5%9C%B0%E9%9C%87%23&amp;from=default">#四川甘孜5.6级地震#</a>】中国地震台网正式测定：04月01日20时23分在四川甘孜州石渠县（北纬33.04度，东经98.92度）发生5.6级地震，震源深度10千米。<a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E4%B8%AD%E5%9B%BD%E5%9C%B0%E9%9C%87%E5%8F%B0%E7%BD%91%E9%80%9F%E6%8A%A5?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=中国地震台网速报">@中国地震台网速报</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%A4%AA%E5%8E%9F%E4%B8%80%E5%91%BD%E6%A1%88%E5%AB%8C%E7%8A%AF%E6%BD%9C%E9%80%8331%E5%B9%B4%E5%90%8E%E8%A2%AB%E6%8A%93%23&amp;from=default">#太原一命案嫌犯潜逃31年后被抓#</a>】4月1日，太原市公安局发布通报，3月29日凌晨，杏花岭分局在河南省驻马店市上蔡县将潜逃31年的犯罪嫌疑人李某钏（女，61岁，河南省郾城县人）抓获，一举侦破1989年发生于太原的“12.5”故意杀人案。<br><br>1989年12月5日，太原杏花岭区东涧河发生一起10岁女童陈某被杀案。 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IBl1QzhFj" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4488989748409389:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4488989748409389&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4488975245099505" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IBkEsloC5?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-01 18:56" date="1585738562000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4488975245099505:fromprofile"> 2020-4-1 18:56</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	                                            <span title="可于本微博右侧下拉菜单查看编辑记录">已编辑</span>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【为了仍在院治疗的一千多名患者，<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%BA%94%E9%99%A2%E5%A3%AB%E9%A2%86%E8%A1%94%E7%95%99%E5%9C%A8%E6%AD%A6%E6%B1%89%E7%BB%A7%E7%BB%AD%E6%88%98%E6%96%97%23&amp;from=default">#五院士领衔留在武汉继续战斗#</a>】截至3月31日，湖北仍在院治疗的新冠肺炎患者有1283例，其中重症311例、危重症124例。为了这1283位患者，黄璐琦、张伯礼、王辰、乔杰、陈薇5位院士以及一群白衣战士仍在坚守，继续与死神赛跑。（长江日报） ​​​​                                            </div>

                                <a name="4488973336921176" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IBkBnt2vS?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-01 18:48" date="1585738107000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4488973336921176:fromprofile"> 2020-4-1 18:48</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%8C%97%E4%BA%AC%E9%9D%9E%E6%AF%95%E4%B8%9A%E5%B9%B4%E7%BA%A7%E6%9A%82%E4%B8%8D%E5%8D%A0%E5%91%A8%E5%85%AD%E6%97%A5%E5%92%8C%E6%9A%91%E5%81%87%23&amp;from=default">#北京非毕业年级暂不占周六日和暑假#</a>】4月1日，北京市教委新闻发言人李奕接受采访时表示，本学期的教学内容不会推到下学期。李奕称，相对而言北京的信息化水平和师生总体素质比较高，希望努力提高单位时间的教育教学效率和学习效率。就非毕业年级而言，目前安排的教学没有占用周六日，时间点是按过去 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IBkBnt2vS" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4488973336921176:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4488973336921176&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>

<!-- 微博心情，独立于标准的ul节点 -->
                    <div class="WB_media_wrap clearfix" node-type="feed_list_media_prev">
        <div class="media_box">
            <!--判断图片的个数，渲染图片-->
                            <!--图片个数等于1，只显示图片-->
                
				 		    <!--picture_count == 1-->

                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4488967943041509" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IBksGcLeB?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-01 18:27" date="1585736821000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4488967943041509:fromprofile"> 2020-4-1 18:27</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://weibo.com/" rel="nofollow">健康医疗 · 视频社区</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E9%92%9F%E5%8D%97%E5%B1%B1%E5%88%A4%E6%96%AD%E5%9B%BD%E5%86%85%E4%B8%8D%E4%BC%9A%E6%9C%89%E7%AC%AC%E4%BA%8C%E6%B3%A2%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%E6%9A%B4%E5%8F%91%23&amp;from=default">#钟南山判断国内不会有第二波疫情暴发#</a>】4月1日，接受采访时，<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E9%92%9F%E5%8D%97%E5%B1%B1%E8%A1%A8%E7%A4%BA%E6%97%A0%E7%97%87%E7%8A%B6%E6%84%9F%E6%9F%93%E8%80%85%E4%B8%8D%E4%BC%9A%E5%BC%95%E8%B5%B7%E5%A4%A7%E6%9A%B4%E5%8F%91%23&amp;from=default">#钟南山表示无症状感染者不会引起大暴发#</a>。他表示，因为我们有强有力的监测系统，一旦发现（无症状感染者）立即隔离，同时对相关接触者也立即隔离观察，第一时间切断传播链的话，不会出现像第一波那样的疫情暴发。<a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4488967943041509:1034-video:1034%3A4488941227671567:page_100206_home:2803301701:4488967943041509:2803301701" title="深圳卫视深视新闻的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A6ZCgAfX" alt="http://t.cn/A6ZCgAfX" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>深圳卫视深视新闻的微博视频</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E8%A5%BF%E7%8F%AD%E7%89%99%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%E7%A1%AE%E8%AF%8A%E7%97%85%E4%BE%8B%E8%B6%85%E8%BF%8710%E4%B8%87%23&amp;from=default">#西班牙新冠肺炎确诊病例超过10万#</a>】据西班牙卫生部4月1日公布的数据，西班牙较前日新增确诊病例7719例，新增死亡病例864例，累计确诊病例达102136例，其中9053人死亡，22647人治愈出院。<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E8%A5%BF%E7%8F%AD%E7%89%99%E6%88%90%E7%AC%AC%E4%B8%89%E4%B8%AA%E7%A1%AE%E8%AF%8A%E8%B6%8510%E4%B8%87%E5%9B%BD%E5%AE%B6%23&amp;from=default">#西班牙成第三个确诊超10万国家#</a>。（人民日报记者姜波） ​​​​                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>

<!-- 微博心情，独立于标准的ul节点 -->
                    <div class="WB_media_wrap clearfix" node-type="feed_list_media_prev">
        <div class="media_box">
            <!--判断图片的个数，渲染图片-->
                            <!--图片个数等于1，只显示图片-->
                
				 		    <!--picture_count == 1-->
    <ul class="WB_media_a  WB_media_a_m1 clearfix" action-data="isPrivate=0&amp;relation=0&amp;clear_picSrc=%2F%2Fwx2.sinaimg.cn%2Fmw690%2Fa716fd45ly1gdeekr9rrjj20ob0obk0y.jpg">
                        <li class="WB_pic li_1 S_bg1 S_line2 bigcursor li_n_mix_h " action-data="isGoldenV=0&amp;isPrivate=0&amp;relation=0&amp;pid=a716fd45ly1gdeekr9rrjj20ob0obk0y&amp;object_ids=1042018%3A9b61e6be8eeb5e72a9b0e3af3eb0e244&amp;photo_tag_pids=&amp;uid=2803301701&amp;mid=4488956110940716&amp;pic_ids=a716fd45ly1gdeekr9rrjj20ob0obk0y&amp;pic_objects=" action-type="feed_list_media_img" suda-uatrack="key=tblog_newimage_feed&amp;value=image_feed_unfold:4488956110940716:a716fd45ly1gdeekr9rrjj20ob0obk0y:2803301701:0">
                           <img src="//wx2.sinaimg.cn/orj360/a716fd45ly1gdeekr9rrjj20ob0obk0y.jpg">
          <i class="W_loading" style="display:none;"></i>
                     <i class="W_loading" style="display:none;"></i>
                    </li>
    </ul>
                    </div>
    </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%AD%E6%96%B9%E5%9B%9E%E5%BA%94%E8%93%AC%E4%BD%A9%E5%A5%A5%E7%A7%B0%E7%BE%8E%E6%8A%97%E7%96%AB%E5%9B%BD%E9%99%85%E6%8F%B4%E5%8A%A9%E8%BF%9C%E8%B6%85%E4%B8%AD%E5%9B%BD%23&amp;from=default">#中方回应蓬佩奥称美抗疫国际援助远超中国#</a>：尽心尽力，无意攀比】据报道，美国国务卿蓬佩奥3月31日在国务院记者会上说，美国对国际抗击新冠肺炎疫情资助的数额远远超过中国，只要看到高质量、有效的援助，那就是“美方的慷慨”。4月1日<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%8D%8E%E6%98%A5%E8%8E%B9%E5%8F%91%E9%97%AE%E8%93%AC%E4%BD%A9%E5%A5%A5%E6%8A%8A%E7%BE%8E%E5%9B%BD%E9%99%85%E6%8F%B4%E5%8A%A9%E4%BB%8E1948%E5%B9%B4%E7%AE%97%E8%B5%B7%23&amp;from=default">#华春莹发问蓬佩奥把美国际援助从1948年算起#</a>：我仔细看了这场 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IBk4A8ewq" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4488953001962450:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4488953001962450&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4488949613783631" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IBjZ7fSij?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-01 17:14" date="1585732451000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4488949613783631:fromprofile"> 2020-4-1 17:14</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【外交部回应<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E7%BE%8E%E5%9B%BD%E6%8B%92%E7%BB%9D%E8%BF%9B%E5%8F%A3%E4%B8%AD%E5%9B%BDKN95%E5%8F%A3%E7%BD%A9%23&amp;from=default">#美国拒绝进口中国KN95口罩#</a>：抗疫物资认证标准差异不应成为合作障碍】4月1日，外交部发言人华春莹针对“美国食品药品管理局（FDA）拒绝允许N95口罩的中国替代品KN95口罩入美”的提问回应称，不清楚美方出于什么考虑作此决定。华春莹表示，当前疫情形势下，口罩是各国急需物资，中国国内的 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IBjZ7fSij" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4488949613783631:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4488949613783631&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                    <a href="javascript:void(0);" class="S_txt2" action-type="fl_like" action-data="version=mini&amp;qid=heart&amp;mid=4488949613783631&amp;loc=profile&amp;cuslike=1&amp;hide_multi_attitude=1&amp;liked=0" title="赞" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=like"><span class="pos"><span class="line S_line1">
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                <span node-type="like_status" class=""><em class="W_ficon ficon_praised S_txt2">ñ</em><em>51200</em></span>                        </span></span></a>
                    <span class="arrow" node-type="cmtarrow"><span class="W_arrow_bor W_arrow_bor_t"><i class="S_line1"></i><em class="S_bg1_br"></em></span></span>
                </li>
            </ul>
        </div>
    </div>
            <div node-type="feed_list_repeat" class="WB_feed_repeat S_bg1" style="display:none;"></div>

                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民日报</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4488944844076006" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IBjRqh6m2?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-01 16:55" date="1585731314000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4488944844076006:fromprofile"> 2020-4-1 16:55</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/4iDt6Q" rel="nofollow">微博云剪</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【北京：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%A4%96%E5%9C%B0%E6%9D%A5%E4%BA%AC%E5%B0%B1%E5%8C%BB%E9%9C%80%E9%9A%94%E7%A6%BB14%E5%A4%A9%23&amp;from=default">#外地来京就医需隔离14天#</a>】北京市卫健委新闻发言人高小俊表示，按北京市现行的疫情防控要求，返京人员和来京人员均需居家或集中隔离14天。<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%8C%97%E4%BA%AC%E5%BB%BA%E8%AE%AE%E4%BA%AC%E5%A4%96%E6%82%A3%E8%80%85%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%E6%9C%9F%E9%97%B4%E4%BC%98%E5%85%88%E5%BD%93%E5%9C%B0%E5%B0%B1%E5%8C%BB%23&amp;from=default">#北京建议京外患者疫情期间优先当地就医#</a>，减少往返路途中的感染风险。对当地救治能力欠缺的，且需尽快治疗的患者，建议可通过当地医院与北京有关医院联 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IBjRqh6m2" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4488944844076006:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4488944844076006&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                    <a href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民日报</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4488941086145490" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IBjLmpMIO?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-01 16:40" date="1585730418000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4488941086145490:fromprofile"> 2020-4-1 16:40</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【北京：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%B8%85%E6%98%8E%E5%A4%96%E5%87%BA%E6%97%85%E8%A1%8C%E8%BF%94%E4%BA%AC%E5%90%8E%E4%BB%8D%E9%9C%80%E5%B1%85%E5%AE%B6%E9%9A%94%E7%A6%BB14%E5%A4%A9%23&amp;from=default">#清明外出旅行返京后仍需居家隔离14天#</a>】4月1日，北京市人民政府副秘书长陈蓓表示，鉴于北京疫情防控仍然面临严峻复杂的局面，因此北京各方面的防控措施一点也不能松懈，必须从严从实落实各方面要求。清明期间，如有出京旅行返回以后的情况，相关人员仍必须落实居家隔离14天的相关要求。 ​​​​                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>

            <div class="face"><a target="_blank" class="W_face_radius" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_pic" href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" title="人民日报"><img usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" src="https://tvax3.sinaimg.cn/crop.28.0.969.969.1024/a716fd45ly8gdijd1zmonj20sa0saaby.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&amp;Expires=1609515678&amp;ssig=d6XNDgrzlW" width="50" height="50" alt="人民日报" class="W_face_radius"></a></div>
                    </div>

        <div class="WB_detail">
                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民日报</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4488931124712066" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IBjvijLP4?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-01 16:00" date="1585728043000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4488931124712066:fromprofile"> 2020-4-1 16:00</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/IqWDq" rel="nofollow">微博原生直播</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%BA%BA%E6%B0%91%E7%9B%B4%E6%92%AD%23&amp;from=default">#人民直播#</a>：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%B9%96%E5%8C%97%E5%8F%91%E5%B8%83%E4%BC%9A%E4%BB%8B%E7%BB%8D%E7%A8%B3%E5%B0%B1%E4%B8%9A%E6%8E%AA%E6%96%BD%23&amp;from=default">#湖北发布会介绍稳就业措施#</a>】4月1日下午四点，湖北省新型冠状病毒肺炎疫情防控工作指挥部召开第61场新闻发布会，解读稳就业工作的若干措施，介绍统筹推进疫情防控和经济社会发展，全力稳岗促就业的举措，并回答记者提问。<a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E4%BA%BA%E6%B0%91%E6%97%A5%E6%8A%A5?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=人民日报">@人民日报</a> 正在直播↓一起关注！ <a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4488931124712066:1034-video:1034%3A4488939264737303:page_100206_home:2803301701:4488931124712066:2803301701" title="人民日报的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A6ZC8rmZ" alt="http://t.cn/A6ZC8rmZ" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>人民日报的微博视频</a> . ​​​​                                            </div>

                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%B2%B3%E5%8C%97%E9%BC%93%E5%8A%B1%E5%91%A8%E6%9C%AB2.5%E5%A4%A9%E5%BC%B9%E6%80%A7%E4%BC%91%E5%81%87%23&amp;from=default">#河北鼓励周末2.5天弹性休假#</a>】近日，河北省文化和旅游厅印发《河北省文化和旅游产业恢复振兴指导意见》，提出将鼓励推行周末2.5天弹性休假，做精“2.5天微度假”品牌，满足环京津周末、小长假微度假市场需求。河北还将加大景区门票减免力度，<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%B2%B3%E5%8C%97%E9%BC%93%E5%8A%B1A%E7%BA%A7%E6%99%AF%E5%8C%BA%E5%AF%B9%E6%8A%97%E7%96%AB%E4%B8%80%E7%BA%BF%E5%B7%A5%E4%BD%9C%E8%80%85%E5%85%8D%E7%A5%A8%23&amp;from=default">#河北鼓励A级景区对抗疫一线工作者免票#</a>，对随行家属实行 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IBjrE1mwq" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4488928860324906:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4488928860324906&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%A4%96%E4%BA%A4%E9%83%A8%E5%8D%8F%E8%B0%83%E4%B8%BA%E5%9C%A8%E8%8B%B1%E5%AD%A6%E5%AD%90%E5%BD%92%E5%9B%BD%E5%A2%9E%E5%8A%A0%E8%88%AA%E7%8F%AD%23&amp;from=default">#外交部协调为在英学子归国增加航班#</a>】据央视，外交部发言人华春莹在今天举行的例行记者会上介绍，考虑到当前英国疫情形势以及当地中国留学生面临的各种困难，外交部正在积极协调民航等部门，<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%A4%96%E4%BA%A4%E9%83%A82%E6%97%A5%E5%B0%86%E5%A2%9E%E5%8A%A0%E4%B8%B4%E6%97%B6%E8%88%AA%E7%8F%AD%E8%B5%B4%E8%8B%B1%23&amp;from=default">#外交部2日将增加临时航班赴英#</a> ，为确有困难的海外学子归国提供便利。<a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4488925017557470:1034-video:1034%3A4488945392877604:page_100206_home:2803301701:4488925017557470:2803301701" title="人民日报的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A6ZCFwUQ" alt="http://t.cn/A6ZCFwUQ" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>人民日报的微博视频</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【卫健委：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E7%8E%B0%E6%9C%89%E6%9C%AC%E5%9C%9F%E7%A1%AE%E8%AF%8A%E7%97%85%E4%BE%8B%E9%87%8D%E7%97%87%E5%8D%B1%E9%87%8D%E7%97%87%E8%B6%85%E8%BF%871%2F3%23&amp;from=default">#现有本土确诊病例重症危重症超过1/3#</a>】国家卫生健康委新闻发言人、宣传司副司长米锋介绍，3月31日，<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%85%A8%E5%9B%BD%E7%B4%AF%E8%AE%A1%E6%B2%BB%E6%84%88%E5%87%BA%E9%99%A2%E7%97%85%E4%BE%8B%E8%B6%85%E8%BF%877.6%E4%B8%87%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#全国累计治愈出院病例超过7.6万例#</a>，治愈率为93.5%，现有本土确诊病例中，重症危重症超过三分之一。 <a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4488919317951861:1042163-video:1042163%3A4488919253975050:page_100206_home:2803301701:4488919317951861:2803301701" title="人民日报的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A6ZCN9dU" alt="http://t.cn/A6ZCN9dU" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>人民日报的微博视频</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【人民直播：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%9B%BD%E5%8A%A1%E9%99%A2%E8%81%94%E9%98%B2%E8%81%94%E6%8E%A7%E6%9C%BA%E5%88%B6%E5%8F%91%E5%B8%83%E4%BC%9A%23&amp;from=default">#国务院联防联控机制发布会#</a>】国务院联防联控机制定于4月1日15时召开新闻发布会，介绍做好<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%E6%9C%9F%E9%97%B4%E8%84%B1%E8%B4%AB%E6%94%BB%E5%9D%9A%E5%92%8C%E6%B0%91%E6%94%BF%E6%9C%8D%E5%8A%A1%E5%B7%A5%E4%BD%9C%23&amp;from=default">#疫情期间脱贫攻坚和民政服务工作#</a>情况，请民政部、国务院扶贫办相关司局负责人回答媒体提问。<a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E4%BA%BA%E6%B0%91%E6%97%A5%E6%8A%A5?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=人民日报">@人民日报</a> 现场直播，共同关注！ <a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4488915937196040:1034-video:1034%3A4488932549918750:page_100206_home:2803301701:4488915937196040:2803301701" title="人民日报的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A6ZCKxJL" alt="http://t.cn/A6ZCKxJL" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>人民日报的微博视频</a> . ​​​​                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【@ 所有学生！<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%AD%E9%AB%98%E8%80%83%E5%8F%8A%E5%BC%80%E5%AD%A6%E9%97%AE%E9%A2%98%E6%9D%83%E5%A8%81%E5%9B%9E%E5%BA%94%23&amp;from=default">#中高考及开学问题权威回应#</a>】各类学校什么时候开学？高考延期后体检录取如何安排？寒暑假是否调整？中小学生、大学生、研究生、留学生，关于教育，你关心的问题都有回应↓↓扩散周知！<a title="关于高考、中考和开学，你的疑问有权威回应！" href="http://t.cn/A6ZCIDlt" alt="http://t.cn/A6ZCIDlt" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_link">O</i>关于高考、中考和开学，你的疑问有权威回应！</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

                                <a name="4488903647647617" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IBiMYw5uF?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-01 14:11" date="1585721492000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4488903647647617:fromprofile"> 2020-4-1 14:11</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【最新情况！<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E8%A5%BF%E6%98%8C3%E6%9D%A1%E7%81%AB%E7%BA%BF%E6%98%8E%E7%81%AB%E5%85%A8%E9%83%A8%E6%89%91%E7%81%AD%23&amp;from=default">#西昌3条火线明火全部扑灭#</a>】截至4月1日13时25分，四川西昌市经久乡森林火灾泸山正面明火全部扑灭，<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E8%A5%BF%E6%98%8C%E5%B1%B1%E7%81%AB%E6%89%91%E6%95%91%E5%8F%96%E5%BE%97%E9%98%B6%E6%AE%B5%E6%80%A7%E6%88%90%E6%9E%9C%23&amp;from=default">#西昌山火扑救取得阶段性成果#</a>。目前3条火线明火全部扑灭。消防英雄，辛苦了，请一定平安！（宋豪新、王波、王凡） ​​​​                                            </div>

                                <span class="hover">

                                                                                                                    <li><a href="javascript:void(0)" action-data="id=star_1218&amp;isvip=0" action-type="fl_cardCover" suda-uatrack="key=vip_background&amp;value=feed_background_click" title="用此卡片背景">用此卡片背景</a></li>

                                <span class="hover">

a||(a[g]=d(c));a.css=h=[].concat(a.css||[]);a.cssid=i=[].concat(a.cssid||[]);for(var j=i.length,k=h.length;j<k;++j)i[j]=e(h[j]);b(a)}}()
</script>
<script>FM.view({"domid":"pl_lib","js":"home/js/pl/lib.js?version=737b1bcbc5c6542c","jsDefer":true});</script>

                                                                                                             【<a target=\"_blank\" render=\"ext\" suda-uatrack=\"key=topic_click&value=click_topic\"                                                【<a target=\"_blank\" render=\"ext\" suda-uatrack=\"key=topic_click&value=click_topic\" class=\"a_topic\" extra-data=\"type=topic\" 据美国约翰斯·霍普金斯大学发布的全球新冠肺炎数据实时统计系统，截至美国东部时间4月1日晚6时，全美共报告新冠肺炎确诊209071例，死亡4757例，治愈8434例。过去24小时，新增确诊24888例，新增死亡947例。目前，美国的确诊人数已是中国的2.5倍，死亡人数也超过了中国。<br>全美 ​​​​...<a target=\"_blank\"
